languages.text: "Ты и правда не знаешь. Она не захотела с тобой делиться или не успела? Уже не важно. Ты от крови династии, и я обязан дать следующий ответ..."

"You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."
languages.original_text: "Ты и правда не знаешь. Она не захотела с тобой делиться или не успела? Уже не важно. Ты от крови династии, и я обязан дать следующий ответ..."

"You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."

languages.text: «No sabes nada. ¿Decidió no contártelo o es que no tuvo ocasión? Ya no importa. Tuya es la sangre de la dinastía, y, por tanto, debo darte la respuesta...».
languages.original_text: "You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."

traits.locale_text: «No sabes nada. ¿Decidió no contártelo o es que no tuvo ocasión? Ya no importa. Tuya es la sangre de la dinastía, y, por tanto, debo darte la respuesta...».

languages.text: “看来，你是真的一无所知。是她当初没有告诉过你吗？还是她没能找到机会？不过，这并不重要。你的身体里流淌着王朝的血脉，因此，我必须告知你想要的答案……”
languages.original_text: "You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."

traits.locale_text: “看来，你是真的一无所知。是她当初没有告诉过你吗？还是她没能找到机会？不过，这并不重要。你的身体里流淌着王朝的血脉，因此，我必须告知你想要的答案……”

languages.text: 「本当に何も知らないんだな。彼女は教えないことを選んだのか、教える機会がなかったのか？もうどうでもよい。あなたは、王朝の血だ。だから、この答えを与えざるを得ない…」
languages.original_text: "You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."

traits.locale_text: 「本当に何も知らないんだな。彼女は教えないことを選んだのか、教える機会がなかったのか？もうどうでもよい。あなたは、王朝の血だ。だから、この答えを与えざるを得ない…」

languages.text: "Ihr wisst es wirklich nicht. Hat sie es Euch bewusst nicht erzählt oder hatte sie keine Chance dazu? Es spielt keine Rolle mehr. In Euch fließt das Blut der Dynastie, also bin ich gezwungen, Euch diese Antwort zu geben ..."
languages.original_text: "You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst es wirklich nicht. Hat sie es Euch bewusst nicht erzählt oder hatte sie keine Chance dazu? Es spielt keine Rolle mehr. In Euch fließt das Blut der Dynastie, also bin ich gezwungen, Euch diese Antwort zu geben ..."

languages.text: « Vous l'ignorez ? Vous a-t-elle volontairement caché la vérité, ou bien a-t-elle manqué de temps pour vous la révéler ? Peu importe, à présent. Dans vos veines coule le sang de la dynastie, et je me vois donc contraint de vous répondre... »
languages.original_text: "You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'ignorez ? Vous a-t-elle volontairement caché la vérité, ou bien a-t-elle manqué de temps pour vous la révéler ? Peu importe, à présent. Dans vos veines coule le sang de la dynastie, et je me vois donc contraint de vous répondre... »

languages.text: "Demek gerçekten bilmiyorsun. Sana söylememeyi mi seçti yoksa söylemeye fırsatı olmadı mı acaba? Artık önemi yok. Hanedanlığın kanı damarlarında akıyor. Sana cevap vermek zorundayım..."
languages.original_text: "You really do not know. Did she choose not to tell you, or did she not get the chance? It doesn't matter anymore. Yours is the blood of the dynasty, and so, I am compelled to give you this answer..."
